Rebecca Nandwa bụ onye edemede Kenya nke a maara nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ụmụ ya dere na Swahili
Ọ na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ odeakụkọ na ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ ma bụrụ onye nkuzi.
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Western Kenya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Limuru, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kenyatta na B.Ed
Ọrụ nkuzi mbụ ya bụ na Emusire High School na afọ 1988
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ kwagara Nairobi n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịnọ ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ mba ahụ nso.

N'afọ 2013, o ritere ihe nrite Jomo Kenyatta na Kiswahili Children's Category maka akwụkwọ ya Nimefufuka, ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara n'afọ 2015. O dere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ 35 maka ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ dị iche iche, gụnyere ole na ole na Bekee
Ụlọ ọrụ Kenyan Institute of Curriculum Development na-atụ aro akwụkwọ ya maka iji ya mee ihe na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ

Chura Mcheza Ngoma gosipụtara na International Board on Books for Young People (IBBY) n'ịntanetị.  A na-etinye ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ Nandwa na mmemme Worldreader na Pole Mzee Bonga ya bụ otu n'ime ihe ha dere maka East Afrika n'afọ 2014.
